Source.Name: kdebase-workspace
Source.Summary: KDE4 Workspace consists of what is the desktop of the KDE4
Source.Description: kdebase-workspace contains the main KDE components like kdm (the login manager of KDE), khotkeys (a hotkey daemon), klipper (a cut & paste history utility), kmenuedit (the menu editor), krandrtray (resize and rotate X screens), krunner (a command run interface), ksysguard (a performance monitor), kwin (the window manager of KDE), kxkb (a utility to switch keyboard maps), plasma (the KDE desktop, panels and widgets workspace application) and systemsettings (the configuration editor).

Package.Name: kdebase-workspace-doc
Package.Description: kdebase-workspace-doc package contains documentation about applications and modules included in kdebase-workspace package.

Package.Name: kdm
Package.Description: kdm provides the graphical login screen, shown shortly after boot up, log out, and when user switching.

Package.Name: cursor-theme-oxygen-black
Package.Description: cursor-theme-oxygen-black contains Oxygen Black mouse cursor theme of KDE4.

Package.Name: cursor-theme-oxygen-black-big
Package.Summary: KDE4 Oxygen Black Cursor Theme (big size)
Package.Description: cursor-theme-oxygen-black-big contains Big Oxygen Black mouse cursor theme of KDE4.

Package.Name: cursor-theme-oxygen-blue
Package.Description: cursor-theme-oxygen-blue contains Oxygen Blue mouse cursor theme of KDE4.

Package.Name: cursor-theme-oxygen-blue-big
Package.Summary: KDE4 Oxygen Blue Cursor Theme (big size)
Package.Description: cursor-theme-oxygen-blue-big contains Big Oxygen Blue mouse cursor theme of KDE4.

Package.Name: cursor-theme-oxygen-white
Package.Description: cursor-theme-oxygen-white contains Oxygen White mouse cursor theme of KDE4.

Package.Name: cursor-theme-oxygen-white-big
Package.Summary: KDE4 Oxygen White Cursor Theme (big size)
Package.Description: cursor-theme-oxygen-white-big contains Big Oxygen White mouse cursor theme of KDE4.

Package.Name: cursor-theme-oxygen-yellow
Package.Description: cursor-theme-oxygen-yellow contains Oxygen Yellow mouse cursor theme of KDE4.

Package.Name: cursor-theme-oxygen-yellow-big
Package.Summary: KDE4 Oxygen Yellow Cursor Theme (big size)
Package.Description: cursor-theme-oxygen-yellow-big contains Big Oxygen Yellow mouse cursor theme of KDE4.

Package.Name: cursor-theme-oxygen-zion
Package.Description: cursor-theme-oxygen-zion contains Oxygen Zion mouse cursor theme of KDE4.

Package.Name: cursor-theme-oxygen-zion-big
Package.Summary: KDE4 Oxygen Zion Cursor Theme (big size)
Package.Description: cursor-theme-oxygen-zion-big contains Big Oxygen Zion mouse cursor theme of KDE4.

Package.Name: kdebase-wallpapers
Package.Description: kdebase-wallpapers contains default wallpapers of KDE4.

Update.Comment: Fix clipboard gets emptied when application quits bug: #11204 and kdebug#229052
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Rebase showNotifications patch for KDE 4.4 to show device notifications again. Thanks. to Gokmen.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Disable geolocation dataengine to workaround #13208
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Remove guest login patch since it causes KDM to crash at startup if user activated autologin in YALI.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Patch by Mesutcan Kurt is added to fix KDM problems of guest user account.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to 4.4.5
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Show KDE progress if migration of 2008-2009 takes much time.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Add two more crash fixes for Plasma.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to 4.4.4
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Set some variables exported in startkde before dbus session bus starts. #9966
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Enable suse grub patch, modify it to use grub-once instead of grub-set-default.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Move Plasmalicious wallpaper and some resolutions of Ethais and Air wallpapers to kdebase-wallpapers package to make kdebase-workspace smaller.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Fix KOSD's transparency problem when compositing is disabled.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Move DBus system service files to /usr/share/dbus-1/system-services
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to 4.4.3
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: - Version bump to 4.4.2, - Implement kded module for KOSD and replace the kosd package (Ozan), - Handle brightness keys and show an OSD through KOSD (Ozan), - plasma_runner_windows: be more careful when matching (Ozan),
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Fix for KDM Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2010-0436.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Extend NoStrip to make a smaller package.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: ksplash: Close the splash prematurely only on double-click
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: ksplashx: Keep XDM background if available
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Version bump to 4.3.5
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Add .kde4->.kde3.5 symlink in startkde for kde3-kde4 migration
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Fix BBC weather URI for LCD Weather Station Plasmoid.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Driver and version detection fixes for Mesa >= 7.6
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Increase kdmrc/ServerTimout to 30 seconds
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Hide otheroptions (which appeared after Bahadir's latest GRUB changes) from kdm and ksmserver.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Change Xft defaults
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Replace tasma.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Take 2 patches from KDE 4.4 about plasma and kded crash.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Disable low disk space check and KDM active session popup, if we're running on a live medium.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to 4.3.4
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: - Replace PolicyKit-kde4 as well as PolicyKit-kde, - Adjust brightness upon wheel events over battery monitor applet.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Drop zorg dependency of kdebase-workspace package and add IsA tags for sub-packages
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Version bump to latest KDE version
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Add SuSE patches about plasma and KDM.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Remove upd file and run KDE 4.2-4.3 script during startkde to prevent problems of running plasma of KDE 4.2
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Sync suse's lowspacenotifier patch. It's now working.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Fix style change during 4.2-4.3 switch. Still needs work to work properly.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Use xdm's Xresources file for login screen
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Disable ugly logout blur effect. Can be manually turned on by writing UseBlur=true to Effect-Logout section of kwinrc.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Fix solid-action-priority patch. Now file manager option should be displayed as the first option in hotplug dialogue.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to latest KDE version
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Use full path in Default value of KDM Theme, using just theme name doesn't work when Theme is not defined in kdmrc.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Drop caption parameter from systemsettings.desktop to fix the caption translation.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Revert the persistent KNotification icon from systray.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Use KHotNewStuff server of OI.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: * Fixes about composition and driver detection of intel and radeon cards. * Hide display settings of KDE, we use our own display settings screen.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Don't hide information button in system tray plasmoid.
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: Give the ability to enable/disable wallpaper transition effect.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Avoid KWin from disabling desktop effects when the system time changes (#10135).
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Use our new KDE 4.3 based KDM theme, thanks to Ozan.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Fix transparent preview in background dialog.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: - Use plasma themed clock and QTimeEdit in date and time module, - Fix various scaling and rendering problems in shutdown dialog.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: * Add 'Show Desktop' and 'Network Manager' plasmoids to the panel. * Increase height of the panel 15px, make default alignment AlignCenter, decrease panel width 10px from each side.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Add patches about Plasma desktop shell including: * Do not unhide panel in autohide mode if there is fullscreen application, kde#194310. * Do not show display manager's background image when entering fullscreen mode in an application, kde#189726. * Fix plasma crash while removing the panel in its minimum size, kde#196585.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Decrease bouncing cursor timeout to 5 seconds, 30 is too high for this.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: * Fix double battery plasmoids, kde#156078. * Move default Air wallpaper to workspace package. * Fix scrollbar of device notifier.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: * Fix wrong font size displayed in fonts KCM, we have to maintain 2 seperate patches to decrease default font size to 9. * Fix layout problems of fonts KCM. * Fix annoying wallpaper fade effect in startup.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Wallpaper fade effect in slideshow mode is added from SVN.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Fix symlinking problem of create_symlink_exe.cmake.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Notification and shadow effect fixes from SVN
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to latest stable release
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Configure date and time by right clicking the digital-clock applet
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Translation support for notification agent added.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Show Device Notification when plugged
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: Fix plasma configuration layout.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Better complain about missing face icons kde#188033
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: sytray flicker and memleak patch from trunk
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Use InitialPreference in solid action desktop files and use this value to determine action priority.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Switch to Solid 4.3, this brings a new solid-actions-kcm module named 'Device Actions'
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Do not create screen-configurations.xml file in home, handle if .local is not created yet.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Make Oxygen default KWin decoration, remove stripes and change default titlebuttons.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Do not set default language of KDM to tr, so let KDM use the system locale.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Change kdmrc4 file name to kdmrc
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: * Make Plasmalicious wallpaper default. * Enable TerminateServer kdm option by default.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Add various workspace patches from Kubuntu
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to latest stable release

Update.Comment: Install kdm.desktop to /usr/share/display-managers for xdm service

Update.Comment: Make KDM default theme fonts smaller.
